name: The CR7 NFT Collection ( Christian Ronaldo)

metadata.name: The Coronation (SR)
metadata.description: A statue of Ronaldo receiving the iconic No.7 shirt, which has since become inseparable from his name. Quantity and color: 17 in Metaverse color; 25 in Gold color. NFT owner benefits: (1) Signed Ronaldo Binance shirt. (2) Automatic Whitelist into all future CR7 NFT drops. (3) Free CR7 Mystery Box (from a future collection). (4) Entry into giveaways to win Ronaldo and Binance merchandise.
